info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 10:17PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Hardin, central Pope, northwestern Crittenden and northern Livingston Counties through 1100 PM CDT... At 1017 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Golconda, or 16 miles northeast of Metropolis, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Golconda around 1025 PM CDT. Rosiclare and Joy around 1035 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for southern Illinois...and western Kentucky.
